name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor
display_help: Dark Armor allows you to tap into the powers of the Netherworld for protection. Some Dark Armor powers drain your foes to strengthen you. Dark Armor offers very good resistance to Negative Energy damage, and is one of the only defensive sets that offer some resistance to Psionic damage. However. its resistance to Energy is weak and it offers no protection to Knockback.

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Hide
powers.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. No Endurance cost. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 1.88% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
3.75% strength to ranged, melee, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self

3.75% strength to ranged, melee, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
37.50% strength to AoE for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Dark_Embrace
powers.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to negative energy damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to negative energy damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Murky_Cloud
powers.display_help: You create a Murky Cloud enshrouding you. This cloud can absorb all forms of energy, making you more resistant to Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks, as well as Endurance Drain effects. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, End Drain)

display_info: 22.50% resistance to fire damage, cold damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
69.20% resistance to endurance debuff, recovery rate debuff for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to fire damage, cold damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Shadow_Dweller
powers.display_help: You are a true Shadow Dweller of the Netherworld. Your affinity for the shadows grants you an inherent bonus to all Defense, as well as an increased Perception and a resistance to Immobilization. Your Perception bonus and resistance to Immobilization improves over level. Shadow Dweller is an Auto power. It is always on and costs no Endurance.

display_info: 51.90% resistance to immobilize for 10.25s on self
190.30% resistance to immobilize for 10.25s on self
1.88% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 10.25s on self
43.25% resistance to perception radius debuff for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Obsidian_Shield
powers.display_help: You can create a special Obsidian Shield that grants good resistance to Psionic damage. With your mind enshrouded in darkness you are protected from Sleep, Fear, Hold and Disorient attacks. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Psionic, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear)

display_info: 37.50% resistance to psionic damage for 0.75s on self
-10.4 terrorize protection, hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 0.75s on self
103.80% resistance to terrorize, hold, stun, sleep for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Dark_Regeneration
powers.display_help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Cloak_of_Fear
powers.display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, with a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Oppressive_Gloom
powers.display_help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Dark_Armor.Soul_Transfer
powers.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 60 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 1 ticks of 289.14 heal for 0.5s on self
